name: ICHSIAS '20
description: International Conference on Humanities, Social, Information and Administrative Sciences aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of Humanities, Social, Information and Administrative Sciences. It also provides a premier interdisciplinary platform for researchers, practitioners and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in the fields of Humanities, Social, Information and Administrative Sciences.
